text: Boutros Gemayel (29 June 1932 â€“ 21 August 2021) was a Lebanese Maronite Catholic prelate. He was the emeritus Maronite Archbishop of the Maronite Catholic Archeparchy of Cyprus. He was the Archeparch of Cyprus from 1988 until 2008. Gemayel was born in Greater Lebanon. Gemayel died on 21 August 2021, aged 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lebanese Christians Category:Bishops
title: Boutros Gemayel
